content.body: jmdyck: re https://github.com/tc39/ecma262/issues/2400, you suggest replacing "Set the code evaluation state of contextA such that when evaluation is resumed with a Completion v [...]." with "Resume contextB passing B-VALUE. Let v be the value returned by the resumed computation."
content.formatted_body: jmdyck: re https://github.com/tc39/ecma262/issues/2400, you suggest replacing "Set the code evaluation state of contextA such that when evaluation is resumed with a Completion v [...]." with "Resume contextB passing B-VALUE. Let v be the value returned by the resumed computation."

content.body: problem: it is not generally the case that contextB is the thing which resumes the thing just suspended.
